articles.title: Here’s where BlackRock sees a top thematic ETF investing opportunity as tech soars
articles.content: This week’s ETF wrap shines the light on electric vehicles, an industry that BlackRock’s Jay Jacobs says has taken off but still has a way to go — the kind of “inflection point” the firm looks for in thematic investing opportunities.

articles.title: 2 Key Themes From the Q1 Earnings Season

articles.title: Tech ETFs Roaring to New 52-Week Highs
articles.content: The hot run for the technology sector is back and dominating the stock market rally once again. The rally has pushed many stocks and ETFs to new highs.
